resume_snippet: SUMMARY: Pharmacovigilance consultant and PV leader with 30 years of global experience across pharma and CROs, managing teams in the Americas, EU, and Asia/Pacific regions. Brings a rare blend of sponsor and vendor expertise, having served as Interim Head of PV for multiple biotech startups and led PV operations at top CROs like Covance and Premier Research. Has participated in over 15 global regulatory inspections and contributed to several NDA/BLA submissions, including sections 2.7.4, 2.5, US
